body: This Manga Disappointing Ending And Here is Shitty Too ..
The character on page 27 also seems to lead to the assumption that it also could just be false information (but not much is really known in terms of vocal tone).

Boi how is this netorare? If you have to assume the heroine is in a romantic relationship without any indication from the doujin itself, that is just a baseless conclusion or just you are just projecting yourself into the doujin. Absurd.

The manga should've just conclude after the battle with "Yuuna's father" then continue on to epilogue chapters with the usual harem-esque cliff-hanger ending instead of the current one, since I'm not fond of "MC ends up choosing the obvious girl ending" after all the "harem" he build up.

BokuBen is another example, I already thought that Uruka will be the 'winner' since he's the childhood friend and all. But then the author went and add all the other girl's "alternative ending"... which kinda reminds me to Green-Green.
About fucking time this one got translated
I'm sad that the manga ended and I'm even sadder that we got a shitty Yuuna doujin. Oboro best girl btw.
Can we get more doujins of this anime without Netorare? Fucking hell, where's Yuuna? Bruh this is good lewd material.
